mapper.select: SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.CATEGORY_NUM, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, A.GOODS_AMOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1, C.BIG_CATEGORY, C.SMALL_CATEGORY FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B, CATEGORY C WHERE A.GOODS_NUM = B.GOODS_NUM AND A.CATEGORY_NUM = C.CATEGORY_NUM AND (A.GOODS_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR C.SMALL_CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' ) ORDER BY A.GOODS_NUM DESC

SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.CATEGORY_NUM, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, A.GOODS_AMOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1, C.BIG_CATEGORY, C.SMALL_CATEGORY FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B, CATEGORY C WHERE A.GOODS_NUM = B.GOODS_NUM AND A.CATEGORY_NUM = C.CATEGORY_NUM AND A.CATEGORY_NUM = #{CATEGORY_NUM} ORDER BY A.GOODS_HITCOUNT DESC

SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.CATEGORY_NUM, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1, AVG(C.REVIEW_GRADE) AS GRADE, D.BIG_CATEGORY, D.SMALL_CATEGORY FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B, REVIEW C, CATEGORY D WHERE A.CATEGORY_NUM = #{CATEGORY_NUM} AND A.GOODS_NUM = B.GOODS_NUM AND A.GOODS_NUM = C.GOODS_NUM AND A.CATEGORY_NUM = D.CATEGORY_NUM GROUP BY A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.CATEGORY_NUM, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1, D.BIG_CATEGORY, D.SMALL_CATEGORY ORDER BY GRADE DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE GOODS SET GOODS_HITCOUNT = NVL(GOODS_HITCOUNT, 0) +1 WHERE GOODS_NUM = #{GOODS_NUM}
mapper.select: SELECT GOODS_NUM FROM ORDERS WHERE MEMBER_NUM = #{MEMBER_NUM} AND GOODS_NUM = #{GOODS_NUM}
SELECT * FROM REVIEW WHERE GOODS_NUM = #{GOODS_NUM} ORDER BY REVIEW_REGDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS( ORDER_NUM, ORDER_AMOUNT, MEMBER_NUM, GOODS_NUM, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_PRICE, ORDER_PAYMENT, ORDER_ECHECK ) VALUES ( ORDER_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ORDER_AMOUNT}, #{MEMBER_NUM}, #{GOODS_NUM}, #{ORDER_DATE}, #{ORDER_PRICE}, #{ORDER_PAYMENT}, #{ORDER_ECHECK} )
mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_NUM, O.ORDER_DATE, G.GOODS_NAME, O.ORDER_AMOUNT, O.ORDER_PRICE, O.ORDER_PAYMENT FROM GOODS G, ORDERS O WHERE O.MEMBER_NUM = #{MEMBER_NUM} AND G.GOODS_NUM = O.GOODS_NUM

SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.CATEGORY_NUM, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, A.GOODS_AMOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1, C.BIG_CATEGORY, C.SMALL_CATEGORY FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B, CATEGORY C WHERE A.GOODS_NUM = B.GOODS_NUM AND A.CATEGORY_NUM = C.CATEGORY_NUM

SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.GOODS_DETAIL, A.CATEGORY_NUM, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, A.GOODS_AMOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1, B.GOODS_IMG2, B.GOODS_IMG3, C.BIG_CATEGORY, C.SMALL_CATEGORY FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B, CATEGORY C WHERE A.GOODS_NUM = B.GOODS_NUM AND A.CATEGORY_NUM = C.CATEGORY_NUM AND A.GOODS_NUM = #{GOODS_NUM}

SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.CATEGORY_NUM, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, A.GOODS_AMOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1 FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B, CATEGORY C WHERE A.GOODS_NUM = B.GOODS_NUM AND A.CATEGORY_NUM = C.CATEGORY_NUM AND C.BIG_CATEGORY = #{BIG_CATEGORY}

SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.CATEGORY_NUM, C.SMALL_CATEGORY, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, A.GOODS_AMOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1 FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B, CATEGORY C WHERE A.GOODS_NUM = B.GOODS_NUM AND C.CATEGORY_NUM = #{CATEGORY_NUM} AND A.CATEGORY_NUM = C.CATEGORY_NUM

SELECT GOODS_NAME, GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_DCPRICE, GOODS_IMG1, GOODS_HITCOUNT, SMALL_CATEGORY FROM( SELECT A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, B.GOODS_IMG1, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, C.BIG_CATEGORY, C.SMALL_CATEGORY FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B, CATEGORY C WHERE A.GOODS_NUM = B.GOODS_NUM AND A.CATEGORY_NUM = C.CATEGORY_NUM ORDER BY A.GOODS_HITCOUNT DESC )WHERE ROWNUM <6

SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.CATEGORY_NUM, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, A.GOODS_AMOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1, C.BIG_CATEGORY, C.SMALL_CATEGORY FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B, CATEGORY C WHERE A.GOODS_NUM=B.GOODS_NUM AND A.GOODS_PRICE > A.GOODS_DCPRICE AND A.CATEGORY_NUM = C.CATEGORY_NUM ORDER BY A.GOODS_DCPRICE DESC

SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.CATEGORY_NUM, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, A.GOODS_HITCOUNT, A.GOODS_AMOUNT, B.GOODS_IMG1, C.BIG_CATEGORY, C.SMALL_CATEGORY FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B, CATEGORY C WHERE A.GOODS_NUM=B.GOODS_NUM AND A.GOODS_PRICE > A.GOODS_DCPRICE AND A.CATEGORY_NUM = C.CATEGORY_NUM ORDER BY A.CATEGORY_NUM DESC
SELECT * FROM CATEGORY ORDER BY SMALL_CATEGORY

SELECT A.GOODS_NUM, A.GOODS_NAME, A.GOODS_PRICE, A.GOODS_DCPRICE, A.GOODS_SIMPLE, A.CATEGORY_NUM, A.GOODS_SOLDOUT, B.GOODS_IMG1, C.SAMLL_CATEGORY FROM GOODS A, GOODS_IMG B, CATEGORY C WHERE A.GOODS_NUM=B.GOODS_NUM AND A.CATEGORY_NUM = C.CATEGORY_NUM
